subject: Communication
title: Data Storytelling on Stage
description: A fast breakdown of Data Storytelling on Stage for builders.

hook.text: Hans Rosling made global health statistics thrilling. He proved that data can move an audience to tears.

buildup.text: Most data presentations fail because speakers present numbers without narrative or emotional context.

discovery.text: Data storytelling wraps statistics in human stories: one number, one person, one moment of change.

twist.text: Research shows stories activate more brain regions than data alone â€” making information stickier.

climax.text: Rosling's trick: animate the data, narrate the journey, and let the audience discover the pattern.

punchline.text: Data tells. Stories sell. The best speakers do both.

quiz.question: Who famously demonstrated data storytelling with global health statistics?
